alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette; Henry; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 3:20AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Spalding, east central Fayette, southwestern Henry and southern Clayton Counties through 345 AM EDT... At 320 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Inman, or over Fayetteville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McDonough, Fayetteville, Jonesboro, Stockbridge, Hampton, Lovejoy, Woolsey, Sunny Side, Lake Spivey, Inman, Bonanza, Luella, Atlanta Motor Speedway, Jw Smith Reservoir, Eagles Landing and Irondale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
